sentences.english: Hong Kong Yue Hwa Chinese Products Co. , Rong-Bin, chairman assistant, said.
sentences.chinese: 香港裕华国货有限公司董事长助理荣斌说。

sentences.english: Our products are almost on par with the best foreign-made products.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品几乎与最好的外国货旗鼓相当。

sentences.english: CONTRAST】Contrast these foreign goods with the domestic products.
sentences.chinese: 把这些外国货和本国货货比较一下。

sentences.english: Rarely before has it been so difficult for Japan to control its currency.
sentences.chinese: 以前日本很少有像现在这样难控制本国货币的局面。

sentences.english: She  commuted some foreign currency to domestic.
sentences.chinese: 她把一些外币换成本国货币。

sentences.english: Competition between domestics and foreign imports is growing fiercer.
sentences.chinese: 国货与进口货之间的竞争更加激烈了。

sentences.english: I have never bought foreign goods.
Because US citizens prefer to pay less for foreign made products.
sentences.chinese: 因为美国公民更喜欢买更便宜的外国货。

sentences.english: They drove foreign goods out of the market.
sentences.chinese: 他们把外国货驱逐出市场。

sentences.english: There has always been in Britain a tendency to buy local, for a couple of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 英国一直有购买国货的倾向，这有两个原因。

sentences.english: Cloisonne enamelware is the cream of home-made goods.
It must be a foreign produce.
Hence they sell the dollars and buy back their local currency.
sentences.chinese: 因此他们卖出美元并买回他们的本国货币。

sentences.english: The reasons why US and other foreign products do so well in China are many.
sentences.chinese: 造成美国和其他外国货在中国畅销的原因是很多的。

sentences.english: This will tend to raise imports, worsen the trade balance, and weaken the domestic currency .
sentences.chinese: 这会增加进口，使贸易差额恶化并使本国货币疲软。

sentences.english: The government decided to raise tariff walls against foreign goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定提高关税壁垒以抵制外国货。

definition: Nivea, skin and body care brand
open shelves (in self-service store or user access library)
reasonably priced/inexpensive/to keep prices down/(currency exchange) parity
